text: Driving Miss Daisy is a 1989 American comedy-drama movie directed by Bruce Beresford and was based on the 1987 play of the same name by Alfred Uhry. It stars Jessica Tandy, Morgan Freeman, Dan Aykroyd, Patti LuPone, Esther Rolle, Joann Havrilla and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 9 Oscars and won 4 Academy Awards in 1990. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1989 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s road movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American road movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Bruce Beresford Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Driving Miss Daisy
